trans-unit.source: Specifies the properties that support lookup-based binding.
This class cannot be inherited.

The <xref:System.ComponentModel.LookupBindingPropertiesAttribute> is used to specify the properties used with lookup-based binding, particularly <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> controls.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.LookupBindingPropertiesAttribute> is specified at the class level.
The class can be inherited and does not allow multiple attributes on the same class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LookupBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> class using no parameters.

The default constructor sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LookupBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.LookupBindingPropertiesAttribute.DisplayMember%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.LookupBindingPropertiesAttribute.ValueMember%2A>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.LookupBindingPropertiesAttribute.LookupMember%2A> properties to `null`.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LookupBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> class.

This constructor sets each of its public properties to the corresponding supplied parameter; for example, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LookupBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataSource%2A> property is set to `dataSource`.
The name of the property to be used as the data source.
The name of the property to be used for the display name.
The name of the property to be used as the source for values.
The name of the property to be used for lookups.
Gets the name of the data source property for the component to which the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LookupBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> is bound.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.LookupBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataSource%2A> property is set in the constructors for this class.
The data source property for the component to which the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LookupBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> is bound.
Represents the default value for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LookupBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> class.

The <xref:System.ComponentModel.LookupBindingPropertiesAttribute.Default> member is a static, read-only field that defines an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LookupBindingPropertiesAttribute> class initialized with the default constructor.
Gets the name of the display member property for the component to which the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LookupBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> is bound.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.LookupBindingPropertiesAttribute.DisplayMember%2A> property is set in the constructors for this class.
The name of the display member property for the component to which the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LookupBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> is bound.
Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Object"></xref> is equal to the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LookupBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> instance.

The <xref:System.ComponentModel.LookupBindingPropertiesAttribute.Equals%2A> method returns `true` if the `obj` parameter is of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.LookupBindingPropertiesAttribute> and all the public properties—<xref:System.ComponentModel.LookupBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.LookupBindingPropertiesAttribute.DisplayMember%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.LookupBindingPropertiesAttribute.ValueMember%2A>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.LookupBindingPropertiesAttribute.LookupMember%2A>—are equal to each other.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to compare with the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LookupBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> instance
`true` if the object is equal to the current instance; otherwise, `false`, indicating they are not equal.
Returns the hash code for this instance.
A hash code for the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LookupBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref>.
Gets the name of the lookup member for the component to which this attribute is bound.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.LookupBindingPropertiesAttribute.LookupMember%2A> property is set in the constructors for this class.
The name of the lookup member for the component to which the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LookupBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> is bound.
Gets the name of the value member property for the component to which the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LookupBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> is bound.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.LookupBindingPropertiesAttribute.ValueMember%2A> property is set in the constructors for this class.
The name of the value member property for the component to which the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LookupBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> is bound.
